name: iQQ Partner B Client (CLI003)

values.description: Partner B Client - Maps to CLI003. Get from: terraform output -json cognito_partner_clients | jq -r '.partner_b.client_id'
Get from: terraform output -json cognito_partner_client_secrets | jq -r '.partner_b'
Partner B API Key - Tagged with clientId=CLI003. Get from: terraform output -raw partner_b_api_key_value
Business Client ID (automatically extracted from API key)

description:
Partner B client environment with CLI003 preferences:
- No preferences configured
- Expected result: All 3 quotes (APCO, Client Direct, Route66)

IMPORTANT: This is a template file. Copy to postman-environment-partner-b.json and fill in the credentials.
